An assize sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Chief Justice Glyn and Mr. Serjeant Earle, judges of Assize at Bridgnorth in Shropshire, July the 2d, 1657 / by Thomas Gilbert ... Gilbert, Thomas, 1613-1694.
[6], 29 p.
Printed by A.M. for Francis Tyton ..., London : 1657.
Title page vignette. Errata on p. 29. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
